name: Deep Cover (Enigma Dragons, ChaosTheLegend)
description:
KEEP YOUR LIES STRAIGHT

You’re the world’s most charismatic super spy. Agent number Double O and a Half.

You masterfully tell lies but if your lies don’t add up together, your enemies will become suspicious!

Carefully craft your narrative, as your lies and covers go deeper and deeper.

You will have to infiltrate deeper and deeper into villainous lairs, or else the worlds leaders may end up going deeper and deeper into hypnosis.

Controls
  • Mouse - Point and Click
Windows Installation Instructions
  1. Download the Zip
  2. Unzip to a folder of your choice
  3. Run `Deep Cover.exe`
Soundtrack 🎵

Stream/download “Deep Cover (Original Game Soundtrack)” on Bandcamp

Source Code:

https://github.com/EnigmaDragons/LDJam48
